entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:55 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
